scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w packages/std -w packages/tools && npm run build -w packages/cli && npm run build -w packages/scenarios
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test -w packages/core -w packages/std -w packages/tools -w packages/cli --if-present && npm run test -w packages/scenarios
scripts.test:scenarios: npm run build && npm run test -w packages/scenarios
